data.author: Yogi Berra
data.quote: If you don’t know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.

data.author: Langston Coleman
data.quote: Luck is what you have left over after you give 100 percent.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin
data.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.

data.author: Joe Girard
data.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.

data.author: Maureen Dowd
data.quote: The minute you settle for less than you deserve, you get even less than you settled for.

data.author: Sam Levenson
data.quote: You must learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t possibly live long enough to make them all yourself.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but a man of value.

data.author: Dumbledore–The Philosopher’s Stone
data.quote: There are all kinds of courage, it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.

data.author: Dumbledore–The Philosopher’s Stone
data.quote: The truth.It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.

data.author: Dumbledore–The Philosopher’s Stone
data.quote: After all, to the well-organised mind, death is but the next great adventure.

data.author: Dumbledore–The Philosopher’s Stone
data.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.

data.author: Dumbledore–Chamber of Secrets
data.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”

data.author: Harry Potter–The Prisoner of Azkaban
data.quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.

data.author: Dumbledore–The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.”

data.author: Hagrid–The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: What's comin' will come, an' we'll meet it when it does.

data.author: Sirius Black–The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: If you want to know what a man’s like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.

data.author: Ginny Weaseley- –Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: The thing about growing up with Fred and George,is that you sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.

data.author: Dumbledore –The Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.

data.author: Hermione –The Half-Blood Prince
data.quote: Dumbledore says people find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.”

data.author: Dumbledore-The Half-Blood Prince
data.quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
